releaseNotes:
## Write with AI
![Write with AI](https://cdn.highlight.ing/media/changelog/0_0_300/writewithai.gif)

Press and hold Command (Mac) or Control (Windows) to write with AI anywhere you can type.

## Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Faster image / screenshot uploads
- Improved reliability of selected text detection
- Fixed issues opening audio notes as attachments in Highlight chat
- Resolved multiple crash reports
- Performance improvements (more on the way!)

## Other Changes
- You will now see which model Highlight is using when you ask it something
- For Mac users, MacOS 13.3 or newer is now required for audio capabilities

## Calendar & Meetings

![Google Calendar](https://storage.googleapis.com/cdn.highlight.ing/media/changelog/0_0_261/google-cal.gif)
- **Google Calendar Integration**
  - Schedule meetings directly through Highlight
  - Create meetings using context from your screen, notes, or messages
  - Just connect your Google account to get started

- **Smart Meeting Detection**
  - Auto-detects Google Meet and Zoom meetings
  - Creates automatic transcripts
  - Notes are processed locally for privacy
  - Easy organization with app-specific labeling

## Voice Commands

![Push to talk](https://storage.googleapis.com/cdn.highlight.ing/media/changelog/0_0_261/push-to-talk.png)
 - **Push to Talk**
  - Mac: Hold `command` key
  - Windows: Hold `ctrl` key
  - Speak your requests while holding the key

## Audio Features

![Audio Features](https://storage.googleapis.com/cdn.highlight.ing/media/changelog/0_0_261/audio-note.gif)
- **Manual Recording**
  - Click `+` on the assistant
  - Select "Start new audio note"
  - Perfect for quick voice memos

- **Music Handling**
  - Improved performance by disabling auto-recording during music playback
  - Better system efficiency

## Platform Updates

- Linear integration improvements
- Notion integration improvements
- Various performance enhancements
